title: Sentiment Analysis and Opinion Mining
text: This book is a comprehensive introductory and survey text. It covers
all important topics and the latest developments in the field with
over 400 references. It is suitable for students, researchers and
practitioners who are interested in social media analysis in general
and sentiment analysis in particular. Lecturers can readily use it in
class for courses on natural language processing, social media
analysis, text mining, and data mining.
Download from  Morgan & Claypool Publishers. It is free if your institution has license with the publisher (over 400 such institutions worldwide).
